link.title: Credit/No Credit Information - Central DeWitt Community School District

meta.content: Credit/No Credit Information - Central DeWitt Community School District

Due to the school closures for Covid19 Central DeWitt High School and Middle School will be following a Credit/No Credit option as opposed to awarding letter grades for the Spring 2020 semester. Credit can only be given on any assignment/assessment…

article.class: secondary-page post-5536 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-uncategorized

div.p: Due to the school closures for Covid19 Central DeWitt High School and Middle School will be following a Credit/No Credit option as opposed to awarding letter grades for the Spring 2020 semester. Credit can only be given on any assignment/assessment prior to March 16th. Please click here for more information about the District’s Continuous Learning Plan.

© document.write(new Date().getFullYear()) Central DeWitt Community School District
331 East 8th Street, Box 110
DeWitt, IA 52742
Phone: 563-659-0700 / Fax: 563-659-0707
Bus Line: 563-659-0706
Created by Twin State Web Design
Due to the updated recommendation by Governor Kim Reynolds to prevent the spread of COVID-19 schools will be closed through the end of the school year. Click here for the latest information.
